title: The Golden Dark Age of Reason
material_description: Single channel moving image, black and white and audio
brief_description: An exploration of the beauty of New York’s classically inspired architecture; the Chrysler Building, a blimp passing over the Brooklyn Bridge, a young boy performing backflips on a street corner.
